pr_title: Quartz - make it possible to access the underlying scheduler instance

timeline.bodyText: defaultValue is not necessary. boolean config items defaults to false
timeline.author: machi1990
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,4 +19,12 @@
     @ConfigItem(defaultValue = "5")
     public int threadPriority;
 
+    /**
+     * By default, the scheduler is not started unless a {@link io.quarkus.scheduler.Scheduled} business method is found.
+     * If set to true the scheduler will be started even if no scheduled business methods are found. This is necessary for
+     * "pure" programmatic scheduling.
+     */
+    @ConfigItem(defaultValue = "false")

replies.bodyText: I prefer explicit values so I'd like to keep it as it is.
